puts r.map { || a.join(', ') }file.write('data/texts.json', json.pretty_generate(controller.twilio_client.account.messages.list(page_size: 1000).map { |m| { : m., to: m., body: m.body, date_created: m.date_created } }))file.write('data/transactions.json', json.pretty_generate(transaction.))file.write('data/users.json', json.pretty_generate(user.))puts (text..map(&:) + text..map(&:)).uniq.sortdatabase.production!; texts = (user..map(&:to_text) + transaction.includes(:source, :destination).map(&:to_text) + text.where_to_production).sort_by(&:created_at); puts texts.map { |t| [t.created_at, t.body].join(' | ') }curl -x post -d "callsid=ca6bc26fce2c2fa97c33a1d1dfc02b91ed" http://localhost:3000/voicescurl -x post -d "messagesid=sm482d3e7ed73fb609f3bfa107f751f610" http://localhost:3000/textsrake db:reset db:fixtures:loadstaging: +14153749843+14158057561production: +12312161681dorian: +14156219825, +14153740330+18303707687 jeff:+13054504837+14153740330+14155354880+14156219825+14158057561+16602500542+17143086358+17862054694+18303707687import# all texts# all transactions# all users# phone numbers mapping# print non-duplicated transactions user registrations# created_at:, :, to:, body:# separate staging / production# process messages
